sentence.text: Here, we show that high levels of the actin cytoskeleton-associated protein Fc-gamma receptor signaling pathway involved in phagocytosis (WASP-interacting protein) correlates with tumor growth, both of which are linked to the tumor-initiating cell phenotype.

entity.text: Fc-gamma receptor signaling pathway involved in phagocytosis

sentence.text: We cellular response to interleukin-4 that WIP controls tumor growth by boosting signals that stabilize the YAP/TAZ complex via a mechanism mediated by the endocytic/endosomal system.
